(amụrụ na Machị 2, 1971), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Method Man, bụ ónyé A America na-eti egwu, onye na-ede egwu, ónyé mmepụta ndekọ, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri. A maara ya dị ka onye otu hip hop nke East Coast Wu-Tang Clan
Ọ bụkwa ọkara nke hip hop duo Method Man & Redman

O weere aha egwu ya site na ihe nkírí 1979 Method Man N'afọ 1996, Smith ritere Grammy Award maka Best Rap Performance site na Duo ma ọ bụ Group, màkà "I'll Be There for You/You're All I Need to Get By", nke gosipụtara ónyé na-agụ egwu R&B nke America Mary J
Blige, ónyé ya na ya na-eme ihe nkiri ugbu a na Power Book II: Ghost, nke sitere na ihe ngosi mbụ ya Power.
Smith apụtala na ihe nkiri dịka 187 (1997), Belly (1998), How High (2001), Garden State (2004), The Wackness (2008), Venom (2005), Red Tails (2012), Keanu (2016), na The Cobbler (2014)
Na telivishọn, ya na ónyé na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro, ónyé na-eti egwu East Coast Redman, so mee ihe nkírí na Fox sitcom Method & Red
O nweela ọrụ ugboro ugboro na usoro HBO atọ, dị ka Tug Daniels na Oz, Melvin "Cheese" Wagstaff na The Wire, na Rodney na The Deuce Method Man pụtakwara na ihe ọchị TBS The Last O.G..

A mụrụ ya na Machị 2, 1971, na Hempstead, Long Island, Smith kewara ógè ọ bụ nwata n'etiti ebe óbíbí nna ya na Long Island na ụlọ nne ya na mpaghara Park Hill nke Clifton, Staten Island, nke a maara dị ka Killa Hill. Ka ọ na-etolite na Hempstead, Smith malitere igwu lacrosse mgbè ọ dị obere ma na-aga n'ihu na-akwado egwuregwu ahụ
Ọ gàrà New Dorp High School, ébé ya na Remedy ghọrọ enyi. O nwere ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ, Terri na Missy.
